titles: A salva libertate sent to Colonell Tichburn Lieutenant of the Tower, on Munday, April 17. 1648. By Sir Iohn Gayer knight, late Lord Mayor of London, now prisoner in the Tower, &c. Being occasioned by the receipt of a paper sent unto him by the said lieutenant, wherein the said lieutenant was seemingly anthorized [sic] to carry him before the Lords on Wednesday next, being the 19. of April.
author: Gayer, John, Sir, d. 1649.
notes: Includes at end of text: The publisher to the reader.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Detention of persons --  England --  Early works to 1800.
Prisoners --  Legal status, laws, etc. --  Early works to 1800.
Great Britain --  History --  Civil War, 1642-1649 --  Early works to 1800.
